name: Argo MOLE
description:
Manufacturer: Argo Astronautics
Focus: Mining
Argo’s iconic multi-operator laser extractor, more commonly referred to as the MOLE, lets you work faster and more effectively than ever before, thanks to its patented trilateral mining system. Three independently controlled articulated extraction stations allow for maximum power and near-limitless versatility. The MOLE lives by the adage "many hands make for light work".
description_cn:
制造商：南船座宇航(Argo Astronautics)
定位：采矿
南船座宇航象征性的多人激光采矿船，通常以鼹鼠为名为人熟知。得益于鼹鼠的三重采矿专利技术，采矿的速度和效率大幅提升。三个可独立操作的铰接采矿工作站使得鼹鼠拥有最大的输出能力和接近极限的泛用性。鼹鼠就如同一条谚语所说，众人拾柴火焰高。
